page.title: 14NOTABLE EVENTS IN FLEET
page.content:
The{CARNIVAL.}Every year Fleet has a carnival. There is a children's procession on Saturday and a full procession on Wednesday evening. Other events take place during the week, including a firework display.
The Fleet{HALF-MARATHON}is held in March. The 13 miles course ends at Rushmoor Arena, Aldershot. The runners get a medal if they complete the course. There are also children's races at Rushmoor Arena.
{SUBSIDENCE.}Recently, many houses in Fleet have suffered from subsidence. It is blamed on the very dry summer of 1976."We found our house had subsidence so the builders had to dig down six feet to put in a new floor. We had to move to another house in Fleet for three months."
